node.text: NON MOLOCH? NON MOLOCH RETURNEN FROM BRIGHTSHEOL.
NON MOLOCH HER AT HOM. NON MOLOCH IN MAQQOM YD.
node.choice: Maqqom Yd? The Place outside Itself?

node.text: MAQQOM YD. SOUTH-CONTRE FREEN FROM SALUM.
node.choice: Many Eyes, can you tell me of Maqqom Yd?

node.text:
SOUTH-CONTRE FREEN FROM SALUM. BY TRETE WITH SAAD CALLEN MOLOCH, AND MONEIEN BI ALDERSESSE.
BY TRETE GALGALLIM BILDEN PIPE TO DRINKEN THANE SLIPSTREAM, AND FORGE TO BURNEN STEL-CRISTAL, AND CASKE TO HOLDEN GLOUINGE O FISH.
node.choice: And what of the Freehold? What do you do now?
Who is Non Moloch, from before?

node.text: BY TRETE GALGALLIM SERVEN, BUT NON NOU.
node.choice: I want to ask something else.

node.text: YOU. YOU REGNEN NON HER. NON MOLOCH IN MAQQOM YD.
